description:
It`s Gonta`s mother Shizuha. Between you and me, I have to tell you that I love gambling. Today I milk- err played against Mayu in a game of Even or Odd dice. Of course I won.
I took a video game from Mayu as my spoils, but then she game to get it back. Is... "this" that important?
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: むこうぶちダイスロール
